text:
~Myat pRu#ShadAqjyaM paqSOH Kaluq vA Ala#bdhasyaq hRuda#yamAqtmA&Bi samE#tiq yat pRu#ShadAqjyEnaq hRuda#ya-maBiGAqraya#tyAqtmannEqva pa#SUqnAM prA#NApAqnau da#dhAti paqSunAq vai dEqvAH su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamA#yaqn tE#&manyanta manuqShyA# nOq&nvABa#viShyaqntItiq tasyaq Sira#H CiqttvA mEdhaqM prAkShA#rayaqnthsa 
praqkShO#&Bavaqt tat praqkShasya# prakShaqtvaM ~Myat pla#kShaSAqKO-tta#rabaqrq.hi-rBava#tiq samE#dhasyaiqva- [  ] 52
